professional.title: AI Workflow Automation
professional.riskPrevented: Inconsistent outputs and audit failure risk from ungoverned AI in reporting workflows
professional.problem: Messy operational inputs created recurring manual reporting work
professional.approach: Structured deterministic pipelines with AI used only where ambiguity remained
professional.outcome: Consistent outputs with reduced manual effort

professional.title: AI Decision Support Systems
professional.riskPrevented: Trust breakdown from opaque AI recommendations without reviewable reasoning
professional.problem: Ambiguous business questions lacked repeatable decision logic
professional.approach: Translated open-ended inputs into structured, reviewable outputs

professional.title: Governed Data Systems
professional.riskPrevented: Downstream AI failures and compliance risk from unvalidated data foundations
professional.problem: Unvalidated data created downstream risk for AI use
professional.approach: Designed validation, ownership, and audit-ready ingestion layers

health-coach.context: Personal health coaching system that transforms Google Fit metrics into structured guidance. Built as a fully transparent system to provide usable weekly feedback loops based on activity data.
health-coach.systemDesign: Google Fit export/API → data transformation layer → validated Sheets schema → guidance generation boundary → structured outputs in Google Sheets with clear audit trail.
keyDecisions: Clear schema definition for all data types and transformations
Deterministic transforms for all calculations to ensure reproducibility
Bounded generation layer with explicit input/output contracts
All outputs stored in Sheets for transparent review and iteration
governanceRisk: Privacy-first design: personal data only, no external sharing
Validation of input ranges to catch anomalies early
Reproducible transformations for consistent week-over-week comparison
Open-source codebase enables full transparency and auditability
outcome: Weekly feedback loop operational and usable
Transparent system where all logic is reviewable

workflow-automation.context: Recurring reporting burden emerged from messy operational inputs that required manual synthesis. System designed to automate deterministic portions while containing AI usage to ambiguous summarization tasks only.
workflow-automation.systemDesign: Intake layer → normalization and validation → deterministic pipeline for structured transforms → AI boundary for ambiguous summarization → output generation (documents/slides/reports) → human review checkpoint before distribution.
keyDecisions: Deterministic-first approach: AI only where ambiguity genuinely exists
Schema constraints enforce structured inputs and prevent drift
Human review gate before any outputs leave the system
Versioned audit trail of inputs and outputs for accountability
governanceRisk: Auditability: all inputs and outputs logged with timestamps
Versioned transformations enable rollback and investigation
No client data shown. Details abstracted.
Details abstracted to protect employer context
outcome: Reduced manual effort in recurring reporting workflows
More consistent output quality across report cycles
Clear boundaries between deterministic and AI-assisted steps

decision-support.context: Ambiguous business questions lacked repeatable decision logic, leading to inconsistent narratives. System translates open-ended inputs into structured, reviewable recommendations with explicit reasoning chains.
decision-support.systemDesign: Structured intake form → rubric/framework application → constrained generation with explicit criteria → reviewable recommendation output → decision narrative with reasoning → human checkpoint for final approval.
keyDecisions: Explicit gates and kill-criteria defined upfront for each decision type
Transparency in reasoning: show how inputs map to recommendations
Separation of facts (data) vs suggestions (AI-assisted interpretation)
Structured templates enforce consistency across decision types
governanceRisk: Traceability of all inputs to outputs via decision logs
Human checkpoints at recommendation stage before any action
No client data shown. Details abstracted.
Details abstracted to protect employer context
outcome: Reviewable reasoning chains enable better stakeholder communication

governed-data.context: Unvalidated data creates downstream risk for AI and automation systems. Designed validation, ownership mapping, and audit-ready ingestion layers to establish safer foundations for analytics and automation workflows.
governed-data.systemDesign: Ingestion layer → validation rules (schema, range, consistency checks) → ownership/lineage mapping → audit log generation → curated data layer → controlled access for downstream consumers.
keyDecisions: Reject or flag bad data early at ingestion boundaries
Explicit ownership assignment for every data entity
Minimal access principle: consumers only see what they need
Reversible transformations to enable root cause investigation
governanceRisk: Audit trails capture all data movements and transformations
Access control boundaries enforce least-privilege principles
No client data shown. Details abstracted.
Anonymized by design: no client-specific schemas shown
outcome: Safer foundations for downstream automation and AI systems
Reduced risk from unvalidated or unowned data
Clear audit trail enables compliance and investigation workflows
